head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWERS, BEATRICE M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWERS, BEATRICE M.

block.p: LEWERS-Beatrice M. On Sunday, June 25, 2000 at the Washington House. Wife of the late William W. Lewers. Mother of Barbara A. Lewers and William J. Lewers. Grandmother of Mark and John Lewers. Also surviving are two sisters, Evelyn Gallagher and Audrey Parker. A memorial service will be held at the Washington House, Alexandria, VA. Wednesday, June 28th 10:30AM. Interment will be in New York at a later date. Inquiries to Everly-Wheatley Funeral Home, 703-998-9200.

Also surviving are two sisters, Evelyn Gallagher and Audrey Parker. A memorial service will be held at the Washington House, Alexandria, VA. Wednesday, June 28th 10:30AM. Interment will be in New York at a later date. Inquiries to Everly-Wheatley Funeral Home, 703-998-9200.
